text:
Hello everyone  !
I am new on HubSpot. I want to read a books or different guides about how to create a theme custom and modules .
Can you help me with few resources ?
Thank you in advance!

Hey there <@U01795THMLL> while I’m not aware of any books available, we do have tutorials.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-themes|Getting started with Themes>
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-modules|Getting started with modules>
Also encourage checking out
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/creating-an-efficient-development-workflow|Creating an efficient development workflow>
If you do end up discovering any books or non-HubSpot resources on these topics I’d be interested in knowing about them.
